nodes.title: How Non-Profits Can Thrive in the Midst of Major World Crises
nodes.description:
With world crises bombarding at an exponential rate, the natural instinct for churches, ministries, and non-profits might be to scale back due to the fear of uncertainty. Unfortunately, this is a devastating mindset. Could it be that with some creativity and faith, now more than ever might be the perfect time to scale up and share the gospel more than ever?

This session will equip your non-profit organization to not only survive, but grow in the midst of uncertainty and seeming chaos. Learn creative ways to pivot with the “new normal” and emerge stronger than ever.

nodes.title: And I Sawâ€¦.
nodes.description: In the book of the Revelation, there are many powerful truths that God has longed revealed to His people—especially for these times. At the peak of its chiastic structure, when the dramatic climax of the Great Controversy is realized, John exclaims, “And I saw…”  What did he see? What did God reveal? The revelator saw the fulfillment of the greatest commandment ever given to man—“Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature” (Mark 16:15). In this seminar we will discuss the importance of not only understanding, but also experiencing and sharing, the Three Angels’ Messages as God intended.

nodes.title: Witnessing to Christians of Other Faiths
nodes.description: Jesus said, “Other sheep I have which are not of this fold; them also I must bring, …” (John 10:16).  In the second angel’s message, God is calling His people out of Babylon.  This is where, “The great body of Christ’s true followers are still to be found” (GC pg. 390). How can we wisely and productively witness to these Christians from other faiths?

nodes.title: How to Start a Public High School Ministry
nodes.description: In this presentation we will uncover the mechanics of opening up and running successful Adventist Clubs on public highschool campuses: getting past the gate keepers, attracting kids to the club, dealing with the on campus gay straight alliances, reaching out and visiting students’ families when the school district prohibits any kind of proselytizing…etc.

nodes.title: 07-Process of Discipleship - Plant
nodes.description: What are modern methods of intentionally planting the seeds of spiritual interest?

nodes.title: Laity & the Three Angels' Messages
nodes.description: A brief recap of the beginnings of much of what is now lay-led supporting ministry, often referred to as self-supporting ministry. By reviewing the nature of the earliest work and the characters of those who engaged in it, we can learn much of what will lend success to our current efforts to share Christ in the Marketplace.

nodes.title: Extraordinary Leadership Needed
nodes.description: Drawn from years of experience and an extensive study of the principles of leadership, this seminar will provide you with practical ideas to help you expand your leadership impact. While engaged in ministry details, leaders often forget that their development is their most important and most difficult leadership assignment. This seminar will clarify what separates an extraordinary leader from an average one, and provide you with resources to assist you in completing your most difficult leadership assignment–personal growth.

nodes.title: Practical Health Evangelism
nodes.description: Find out why health ministry is so important in fulfilling the great commission and why it’s the best application for using Christ’s method in evangelism. This seminar will explore current trends in health evangelism, what’s working best and what some of the common challenges are. Practical examples and testimonies will be shared from around the world to instruct and inspire towards building your own successful community health outreach.

nodes.title: Sanitariums: Role & Connection with the Three Angels' Messages
nodes.description:
God revealed Sanitariums as “one of the most effective agencies to give light to the world” the last days. Sanitarium concept covers medical or surgical institutions with one distinct feature: “the saving of the souls” and “the proclamation of the truth for this time” are central to everything – goals, plans, decisions. We explore:

How Sanitarium blends-in with other agencies fulfilling Revelation 14 Why is high time to open more around the world?
